I enjoy finding solutions to problems and helping others see how they can solve their own problems. This blog is a place for me to document what I'm learning and perhaps, if I do it well, help others learn a thing or two. If anything you see here is helpful in any way I'd love to hear about it. Connect with me on [Twitter](https://www.twitter.com/drewecherd).
